20101205150047.667|20101205150048.778|CCO|      [ Female Announcer ]
20101205150048.778|20101205150049.889|CCO|       DEPRESSION HURTS.
20101205150049.889|20101205150051.000|CCO|       CYMBALTA CAN HELP
20101205150051.000|20101205150052.111|CCO|       WITH MANY SYMPTOMS
20101205150052.111|20101205150053.222|CCO|         OF DEPRESSION.
20101205150053.222|20101205150054.333|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101205150054.333|20101205150055.444|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS,
20101205150055.444|20101205150056.556|CCO|    YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101205150056.556|20101205150057.667|CCO|          IN BEHAVIOR
20101205150057.667|20101205150058.778|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101205150058.778|20101205150059.889|CCO|        ANTIDEPRESSANTS
20101205150059.889|20101205150101.000|CCO|       CAN INCREASE THESE
20101205150101.000|20101205150102.000|CCO|      IN CHILDREN, TEENS,
20101205150102.000|20101205150103.000|CCO|       AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101205150103.000|20101205150104.000|CCO|    CYMBALTA IS NOT APPROVED
20101205150104.000|20101205150105.000|CCO|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101205150105.000|20101205150106.000|CCO|      PEOPLE TAKING MAOIS
20101205150106.000|20101205150107.000|CCO|        OR THIORIDAZINE
20101205150107.000|20101205150108.000|CCO| OR WITH UNCONTROLLED GLAUCOMA
20101205150108.000|20101205150109.000|CCO|   SHOULD NOT TAKE CYMBALTA.
20101205150109.000|20101205150110.000|CCO|           TAKING IT
20101205150110.000|20101205150111.000|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101205150111.000|20101205150112.429|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101205150112.429|20101205150113.857|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101205150113.857|20101205150115.286|CCO|     SEVERE LIVER PROBLEMS,
20101205150115.286|20101205150116.714|CCO|   SOME FATAL, WERE REPORTED.
20101205150116.714|20101205150118.143|CCO|  SIGNS INCLUDE ABDOMINAL PAIN
20101205150118.143|20101205150119.571|CCO|   AND YELLOWING OF THE SKIN
20101205150119.571|20101205150121.000|CCO|            OR EYES.
20101205150121.000|20101205150122.111|CCO|     TALK WITH YOUR DOCTOR
20101205150122.111|20101205150123.222|CCO|     ABOUT YOUR MEDICINES,
20101205150123.222|20101205150124.333|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101205150124.333|20101205150125.444|CCO|   OR IF YOU HAVE HIGH FEVER,
20101205150125.444|20101205150126.556|CCO|  CONFUSION AND STIFF MUSCLES,
20101205150126.556|20101205150127.667|CCO|     TO ADDRESS A POSSIBLE
20101205150127.667|20101205150128.778|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101205150128.778|20101205150129.889|CCO|     TELL YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT
20101205150129.889|20101205150131.000|CCO|  ALCOHOL USE, LIVER DISEASE,
20101205150131.000|20101205150132.429|CCO|     AND BEFORE YOU REDUCE
20101205150132.429|20101205150133.857|CCO|    OR STOP TAKING CYMBALTA.
20101205150133.857|20101205150135.286|CCO|DIZZINESS OR FAINTING MAY OCCUR
20101205150135.286|20101205150136.714|CCO|         UPON STANDING.
20101205150136.714|20101205150138.143|CCO|  SIDE EFFECTS INCLUDE NAUSEA,
20101205150138.143|20101205150139.571|CCO|  DRY MOUTH, AND CONSTIPATION.
20101205150139.571|20101205150141.000|CCO|      TALK TO YOUR DOCTOR
20101205150141.000|20101205150143.000|CCO|     AND GO TO CYMBALTA.COM
20101205150143.000|20101205150145.000|CCO|    TO LEARN ABOUT AN OFFER
20101205150145.000|20101205150147.000|CCO|    TO HELP YOU GET STARTED.

20101205150747.000|20101205150749.000|CCO|SINCE I WAS FOUR YEARS OLD.
20101205150749.000|20101205150751.000|CCO|AND KIND OF STARTED PLAYING AT
